AI-Powered Answer
Based on the Enterprise Service Agreement (Section 7.2), enterprise customers are eligible for a full refund within the first 30 days of service. After 30 days, refunds are prorated based on remaining contract term. Refund requests must be submitted in writing to the account manager with a minimum 14-day notice period.
